attributes.action: Instruct Gordon Brown to reveal the full state of the economy and risk factors for the future.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown, along with other members of Government repeat the party mantra of a strong economy and we have never had it so good. Many people including financial experts are at odds with this so we petition the PM to instruct The Treasury to reveal the full facts about the economy and not just those favourable to the government line.
